description: This file contains the complete schema initialization for a multi-tenant time tracking database, including table creation, indexes, functions, triggers, sample data, and views specific to a PostgreSQL environment.
external_files: uuid-ossp extension (PostgreSQL extension for UUID generation)

methods.name: update_updated_at_column
methods.description: Function to automatically update the 'updated_at' timestamp on row modifications.

methods.name: check_time_entry_tenant_consistency
methods.description: Trigger function to enforce tenant consistency across related time_entries, users, and projects, and to compute duration.

methods.name: check_project_client_tenant_consistency
methods.description: Ensure the client belongs to the same tenant as the project during insert/update.
